name: Command Small Wire Hooks Value Pack, White, 14 Hooks, 24 Strips

reviews.name: Command Small Wire Hooks Value Pack, White, 14 Hooks, 24 Strips
reviews.reviewText: These products are a mircle for handy man jobs.
reviews.title: Great!!

reviews.name: Command Small Wire Hooks Value Pack, White, 14 Hooks, 24 Strips
reviews.reviewText: These little hooks are a lifesaver. Pretty strong for their size and you don't have to worry about holes or marring the paint. I use them at home for hanging pictures and we use them at work for a wide range of tasks. Easy to remove to.
reviews.title: Handy and Strong

reviews.name: Command Small Wire Hooks Value Pack, White, 14 Hooks, 24 Strips
reviews.reviewText: I bought the value pack of small wire hooks when I started college. I mainly bought these hooks to hang a memo calendar on my wall above my desk; however, they work so well with hanging pictures and other decorations during the holidays. Whenever I need to hang something around my house, I turn to Command Products to get the job done.
reviews.title: 13 June 2013

reviews.name: Command Small Wire Hooks Value Pack, White, 14 Hooks, 24 Strips
reviews.reviewText:
While going on an interview and having trouble keeping my tie in place. I decided to try one of the adhesive strips between my tie and shirt, Yep. You guessed it. They work.
Mike
reviews.title: Multi Use

reviews.name: Command Small Wire Hooks Value Pack, White, 14 Hooks, 24 Strips
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome!! I use them for my husband's caps, my pantry to hang dusters, brooms, etc, I use them to hang my son's toys, literally everywhere. Most recently, my home office window blind broke and I used the hooks to make a makeshift curtain with an old valance I had tucked away! I still have it up - lol! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE 'EM!!
reviews.title: Command Wire Hooks
